events.message: The candidate has submitted an application for the software engineer position, highlighting experience in backend development with Python and AWS.
Application reviewed and classified under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software, developer, and AWS experience.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage this candidate's process and will coordinate interviews and communications.
Initial phone screening completed; candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of Python and microservices architecture.
Candidate responded promptly confirming availability for technical interview next week and expressed enthusiasm about the role.
Technical interview scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 10:00 AM UTC with lead engineer to evaluate coding skills and system design.
